1.title: The Good Thief
1.plot: The Good Thief from the Scriptures was told by Christ that that very day he would join Him in Paradise. His life had been far from perfect. Today, meet another man whose journey to eternal life was never easy. Experience along with Fr. Norbert the way that grace works in even the most difficult of situations.

2.title: The Refugee
2.plot: Fr. Pascal's vocation story started in an unexpected way...as a child in the Vietnam War. Trace how God's love carried him across the world and into a life he could never have imagined.

3.title: The Blind Prayer
3.plot: It started with a passion, a love for the water that eclipsed everything else. When this surfer went through a tragic accident, the results were not what you'd think. Like the blind man who was healed, body and soul, the Lord uses even the most tragic circumstances for good.

4.title: The Unexpected Gift
4.plot: One teenage mother was told the words no pregnant mom wants to hear: "Your child will likely die." Despite immense pressure from others, she kept her baby. Not knowing if her son would survive, if he would have permanent brain damage, and what effect it would have on her life, she chose to continue her pregnancy. With the help of Fr. Norbert, the intercession of a Pope and the prayers of others, she received an unexpected gift.

5.title: The Courageous Son
5.plot: When a child is bullied, they often feel trapped. They are belittled and unhappy, and that there is not often much they can do by themselves to change their circumstances. Yet, with the help of his earthly mother, and the divine intervention from his heavenly one, one courageous boy found a community, a place where he was valued and able to grow.

6.title: The Language of Heaven
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: The Architect
7.plot: After the painful loss of his only son, French architect Jean-Louis Pagès finds hope again from a phone call with Fr. Jerome. Together, they embark on a grand adventure of faith and peace.

imdb.title: City of Saints
plot: St. Michael's Abbey has partnered with award winning director Charles Kinnane to bring you the unprecedented seven part series - _City of Saints_ (qv).
